title: Girlguiding says it has no clue how many trans girls it will exclude under ban
description: In the wake of Girlguiding’s trans ban, the organisation has revealed to PinkNews that it does not have data on the number of trans girls who are members and will – as a result – be barred from participation. Earlier this week, Girlguiding, the national gover…
